inclusion.criterion: Reduction in range of motion in more than two planes
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: < 30 degrees of the external rotation range of motion during shoulder abduct to 90 degree
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Onset time more than three months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No night pain and resting pain
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: History of stroke, diabetes mellitus, rheumatoid arthritis, rotator cuff tear,
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 14-year-old boy with scoliosis and back pain, no other medical condition.
